decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL-155, PL-154, PL-153, PL-152, PL-159, PL-158, PL-157, PL-156 received 04/12/2014 and PL-117 Rev A, PL-102 Rev B, PL-107 Rev A, PL-104 Rev B, PL-103 Rev B, PL-109 Rev B, PL-108 Rev B received on 12/03/2015, email dated 07/05/2015 and PL-110 Rev B received on 22/05/2015 and PL-111 Rev C received on 29/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to first occupation, further details of the proposed boundary treatment shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  The boundary treatment shall be completed before the building is occupied. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - The ground floor windows formed in the rear end of the northern elevation shall be obscure glazed and fixed shut and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing (windows to flat 3 on drawing number PL-117 Rev A received on 12/03/2015)
description: All windows to be changed from single glazed fixed to operable double glazed. Alterations to brickwork to include installation of new windows. Erection of new entrance portico. Front boundary wall to be replaced with metal railing and hedging and landscaping of front yard.
